name: Violeta (Bulk Rare)
description:
HOW TO PLAY

Help Violeta in the fight against anomalies. Select a card action then its target. Those actions cost you energy and your enemies will use the moment  you recharge as an opportunity to attack you. Every time you defeat a group of enemies you will get to choose a new card to add to your deck. 

Created by 

Bulk Rare (@bulkrare) - Art, Code and Design

Viktor Neumann - Character Design

Music by Andrea La Rosa (@3D63)

from Analog Hack

Oracles & Miracles

error cistem terror

Drone [sweet] Drones
